about_the_game:
Fight, solve, craft, travel, explore, and progress!

Soul Passage is an action-packed 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania game that offers a unique experience for players. With features such as Fast-paced combat, solving puzzles, crafting, travelling, exploring, and progression, this game breaks the mould of traditional Metroidvania titles. Players are given control of the skill tree and the fate of the main character, Obligor, as they embark on an extraordinary journey through the Soul Passage, a soul realm filled with diverse planets, creatures, and an abundance of magical items and weapons to discover.

The story of Soul Passage begins with Obligor, a warrior who has lost his family and village. Desperate for a chance to bring them back, he makes a deal with the Heartless Soul Keeper. In exchange for their resurrection, Obligor is given an impossible task: to gather the souls of his enemies and pass them through the Soul Passage. With the player in control, Obligor must navigate the diverse and treacherous realm of the Soul Passage to fulfil his obligation and bring his loved ones back to life.

Soul Passage is a unique blend of RPG and Metroidvania elements, designed to immerse players in an in-depth gameplay experience. You need to travel to different worlds and fight with foes to gather new masks to craft your own unique mask. You will have to deal with different physics while navigating different worlds & you will enjoy the challenging areas of the game more.

As in most Metroidvania games, you will be able to follow different paths to develop the main character in Soul Passage. There are special abilities that you can reach by exploring the Soul Universe and planets, and abilities that you can reach by levelling up are waiting for you in the Soul Passage story.

You will be able to equip 3 different special skills with the weapon you have on Obligor. Also, you will able to customize your gameplay with ranged or close combat by selecting different weapons.

Soul Passage offers you a different crafting feature. The more bosses you encounter and defeat, the more masks you will have the chance to collect.

The Soul Universe is a realm of countless planets and creatures. Obligor's story coincides with some of the planets in a corner of this universe, at the Soul Collector's hand. Some went to look for those doors but never returned, and sometimes unknown monsters appeared from unknown places.
detailed_description:
Just Updated

The Soul Passage team is dedicated to creating the best game possible. We are currently reworking the environment and mechanics to enhance the user experience for our players. During this process, we identified some flaws in the game and storyline, prompting us to redesign the narrative with more thoughtful logic.

As previously promised, we plan to release Soul Passage in late 2025, assuming everything goes smoothly. We also intend to launch a Kickstarter campaign 3-4 months prior to our launch to support our marketing efforts.

Please add Soul Passage to your wishlist and follow us for more updates. We appreciate your interest and support!
